context.rdfs:comment: Used to describe a seat, such as a reserved seat in an event reservation.
context.rdfs:label: Seat

properties.rdfs:comment: The row location of the reserved seat (e.g., B).
properties.rdfs:label: seatRow

properties.rdfs:comment: The section location of the reserved seat (e.g. Orchestra).
properties.rdfs:label: seatSection

properties.rdfs:comment: The location of the reserved seat (e.g., 27).
properties.rdfs:label: seatNumber
